To those who get that error, when the installation is complete, you get the option to install directX and MS visual C++. Just install them (even if you already have them installed)

Tried the game on Windows 7 x64, it works. After installing the game, just copy the contents of the SKIDROW crack folder inside the ISO while mounted in a virtual drive over to the directory where the game is installed.

Installed the game, fixed the dll file and cracked it. Still the same problem. 

Now im downloading the SKIDROW update to give it a try and see whats happening. Any help is more than welcome :)

BLACKSCREEN FIX:

Ive figured it out: Just update your directx. 
Alternatively go to the DIRECTX folder inside the DeathSpank game directory (programfiles) and run this file: dxsetup.exe

That will fix it.

Enjoy and have fun playing this funny game :)
